name: @monstermakes/larry-hybrid-app-builder
description: Dynamically builds a cordova hybrid application for IOS and android based previously produced set of web assets.

scripts.test-coverage: echo '=> Running Tests w/ Coverage' && nyc mocha test/**/*.spec.js
scripts.test-coverage:http: echo '=> Running Tests w/ Coverage' && nyc --reporter=html mocha test/**/*.spec.js
scripts.watch-test: echo '=> Running Test Watcher' && mocha --watch test/**/*.spec.js
scripts.readiness-check: echo '=> Checking Readiness' && npm run lint && npm test
